name: Deep Mud
description:
DEEP MUD  The beaches clay is wet, giving way easily. A bone pops perfectly from the earth; the pockmarks of lost marrow giving it away. Your fangs ache at the thought.

Deep Mud is a game about a vampire killing time in a declining sea side resort town in the north of England. In its current prototype state you can while away a weeks worth of a century doing nothing. There is also a beginning and end, but for now the in-between is lost. They'll join the rest once fully written.
